actions¶

get_actions[source]

get_actions(action)

assert get_actions('all') == ['Directions', 'Discussion', 'Eating', 'Greeting', 'Phoning', 'Photo', 'Posing', 'Purchases', 'Sitting', 'SittingDown', 'Smoking', 'Waiting', 'WalkDog', 'Walking', 'WalkTogether']
assert get_actions('All') == ['Directions', 'Discussion', 'Eating', 'Greeting', 'Phoning', 'Photo', 'Posing', 'Purchases', 'Sitting', 'SittingDown', 'Smoking', 'Waiting', 'WalkDog', 'Walking', 'WalkTogether']
assert get_actions('Smoking') == ['Smoking']
